item.title: Acceptance testing with CodeceptJS
item.description: In this tutorial I’m gonna look at CodeceptJS with NightmareJS backend as a tool for writing acceptance tests for TodoMVC application. After completing it you should be familiar with basic codecept concepts and be able to use it in your own projects. I’m using vanillaJS version of TodoMVC available here but probably you can use whatever version you want toâ€”features are supposed to be the same, the only difference may be in HTML selectors of elements user would interact with (although I haven’t tested it so can’t be sure).
